description: Joshua Billings 01 Mar 2010 15 Creative Commons What does Tragedy do for People? A discussion of what the use of tragedy is, and whether the emotional experience of tragic theatre is simply a passing thrill or a vital part of life. 0:11:29 Oliver Taplin, Joshua Billings 01 Mar 2010

title: Joshua Billings
